name: Voyage of the Dawn Star
description:
Command the last battleship Dawn Star on its final voyage to save Earth.

Repel aliens, fight fires, manage power, don't run out of oxygen!

-= Advanced Controls =-

[Tab] - select next crewmember ([~] to go in reverse order)

[Space] - pause and catch your breath

[Mouse wheel] - zoom

[Right-click]  deselect crew member

-= Good Luck Commander =-

Please enjoy this Minimalist game

Made for: https://itch.io/jam/solodevelopment-game-jam

If you want more levels and content, please comment below!
